name: Gods At Night
description:
I made this prototype as a programing project in Unity 2nd year of uni, so visually is far from perfect, but it works. 

I used mixamo characters and animations and the buildings and decorations are from a Unity asset pack that I bought.

In the game you are a character that needs to steal a lamptop from inside a building, and have some other collectibles to pick up. There are 2 types of enemies, police that follow you if you get in their rsnge of vision and a "mafia" type that will shoot at you if they see you.

made by myself
